description: Look at the input grid. There are shapes filled with color 1, separated by a bar in color 5.
In color 2, highlight the the first cell that the shapes on either side of the middle (color 5) bar have in common.
Continue highlighting the cells the two sides have in common in color 2. There may be one or more. If there is only one, do not change the grid.
Remove all remaining cells filled with color 1.
Crop the grid to remove the separating bar in color 5. This is the final output.
